thread.section_title: Brian Gavin Diamonds Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brian Gavin Diamonds | briangavindiamonds.com
thread.title: Rhona Simonsen
thread.title_full: Brian Gavin Diamonds reviewed by Rhona Simonsen

author: Rhona Simonsen
title: Rhona Simonsen
text:
I was anxious about shopping on line for diamond jewelry without benefit of live inspection. I was pleasantly surprised with the fit and sparkle of the earing jackets.
The only request that I would make, is for the invoice to have contained a description of the item details.
